abstract.xd:detail: TODO: Change these p:exec's into p:data+p:store

section.title: Source Code
section.codeblock: <p:group xmlns:p="http://www.w3.org/ns/xproc"> <p:identity> <p:input port="source"> <p:pipe port="result" step="index"/> </p:input> </p:identity> <p:sink/> <p:exec command="mkdir"> <p:input port="source"> <p:empty/> </p:input> <p:with-option name="args" select="concat($htmlPath,'/img')"/> <p:with-option name="result-is-xml" select="false()"/> </p:exec> <p:sink/> <p:exec command="cp"> <p:input port="source"> <p:empty/> </p:input> <p:with-option name="args" select="concat($selfPath,'/resources/images/directory.png ',$htmlPath,'/img/directory.png')"/> <p:with-option name="result-is-xml" select="false()"/> </p:exec> <p:sink/> <p:exec command="cp"> <p:input port="source"> <p:empty/> </p:input> <p:with-option name="args" select="concat($selfPath,'/resources/images/subfile.png ',$htmlPath,'/img/subfile.png')"/> <p:with-option name="result-is-xml" select="false()"/> </p:exec> <p:sink/> <p:exec command="cp"> <p:input port="source"> <p:empty/> </p:input> <p:with-option name="args" select="concat($selfPath,'/resources/images/superdir.png ',$htmlPath,'/img/superdir.png')"/> <p:with-option name="result-is-xml" select="false()"/> </p:exec> <p:sink/> <p:exec command="cp"> <p:input port="source"> <p:empty/> </p:input> <p:with-option name="args" select="concat($selfPath,'/resources/images/lastsubfile.png ',$htmlPath,'/img/lastsubfile.png')"/> <p:with-option name="result-is-xml" select="false()"/> </p:exec> <p:sink/> <p:exec command="cp"> <p:input port="source"> <p:empty/> </p:input> <p:with-option name="args" select="concat($selfPath,'/resources/images/lastsuperdirs.png ',$htmlPath,'/img/lastsuperdirs.png')"/> <p:with-option name="result-is-xml" select="false()"/> </p:exec> <p:sink/> <p:exec command="cp"> <p:input port="source"> <p:empty/> </p:input> <p:with-option name="args" select="concat($selfPath,'/resources/images/xproc.png ',$htmlPath,'/img/xproc.png')"/> <p:with-option name="result-is-xml" select="false()"/> </p:exec> <p:sink/> <p:exec command="cp"> <p:input port="source"> <p:empty/> </p:input> <p:with-option name="args" select="concat($selfPath,'/resources/images/xslt.png ',$htmlPath,'/img/xslt.png')"/> <p:with-option name="result-is-xml" select="false()"/> </p:exec> <p:sink/> <p:exec command="cp"> <p:input port="source"> <p:empty/> </p:input> <p:with-option name="args" select="concat($selfPath,'/resources/images/xquery.png ',$htmlPath,'/img/xquery.png')"/> <p:with-option name="result-is-xml" select="false()"/> </p:exec> <p:sink/> <p:exec command="cp"> <p:input port="source"> <p:empty/> </p:input> <p:with-option name="args" select="concat($selfPath,'/resources/images/external_link.png ',$htmlPath,'/img/external_link.png')"/> <p:with-option name="result-is-xml" select="false()"/> </p:exec> <p:sink/> <p:exec command="cp"> <p:input port="source"> <p:empty/> </p:input> <p:with-option name="args" select="concat($selfPath,'/resources/images/generated-using-pipeline2.png ',$htmlPath,'/img/generated-using-pipeline2.png')"/> <p:with-option name="result-is-xml" select="false()"/> </p:exec> <p:sink/> </p:group>
